QuestData.Title: Bitter Departure
QuestData.Description: Oi - thank you! I thought for sure I'd just be a spider snack. Perhaps I'm speaking a bit soon though - let's get the heck out of here!$B$BLet me know as soon as you're ready to go... make it quick.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort the Injured Goblin Miner to K3.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the Injured Goblin Miner out of Crystalweb Cavern and then speak to Ricket at K3.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ricket at K3 in Storm Peaks.
QuestData.CompletionText: I take it that things went well at the cavern? Was Tore decent to you?
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for helping out our miner back there, $n! I should be able to put together an antidote no problem.$B$BIf you stumble into Tore again, tell her that she's a jerk for me, will ya?
